title: tour: possible error in description of /moretypes/14
body:
Context: /moretypes/14

The text hinting about functions one can use to create interesting images reads:
>The choice of image is up to you. Interesting functions include (x+y)/2, x*y, and x^y (to compute the latter function, use math.Pow). 

It seems to me that `math.Pow` does not create results as interesting as the `^`(bitwise XOR) operator.
